issue.title: Pelvis vs Foot Orientation after teleport

content.raw:
I tried this morning (Spain time), but the robot was dropped from the harness before lowering it. So I went back to my previous version, later I saw that I might have needed to update the val_description debian or something, but haven't done it so far.


I'll test that and report back.
